group_1.textLeft: What's happening?! Why is there a Witch's@Labyrinth in the hospital?!

group_1.textRight: We need to escape from here, quickly!

group_1.textLeft: E-escape? But what about the hospital?

group_1.textRight: This entire hospital has been swallowed up@by a Witch's Labyrinth.
Unfortunately, many patients will become the@Witch's prey.

group_1.textLeft: Don't I have to fight it?

group_1.textRight: You're not strong enough to battle that@Witch right now.
Thankfully, the Sleepwalking Ghost is in the@area.
She might be making her way here.
Let's get out of the Labyrinth, and call her@using telepathy.

group_1.textLeft: N-no! [chara:200701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200701:cheek_0][chara:200701:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:200701:lipSynch_1]Yu can't come to this hospital...

group_1.textRight: Are you worried about your mother? She WAS@on Yu's list...
Didn't you give up on curing her?
It won't make much difference if she's eaten@by a Witch, or killed by someone.
She doesn't have much longer, anyway.
